title: Multistore Point-of-Sales & Inventory Management System for Retail Shops
description:
This system is commissioned by a retail business to:
  • process sales of products across different shops,
  • automate management of product inventory,
  • transfer of inventory across different shops,
  • interface with a touch-screen panel, barcode scanner, receipt printer and cash drawer,
  • generate various reports for accounting and business development purposes.
  • set permissions of staff for access to different shops.

items.description: Interface with barcode scanner, number-pad for touch screen panel
Transfer of inventory across different shops
Activity log to track all user activity
